title: How to configure SLF4J in WildFly applications
content: In this tutorial, we will discuss how to use Simple Logging Facade for Java (SLF4J) with Wildfly application server. SLF4J is a logging facade that provides a unified interface for various logging frameworks, such as log4j, java.util.logging, and Logback.
